channel.title: Setting Player Rights To Weapons
channel.description:
How Would I Add player rights to a item? im using delta
i have something in my head that might work but id rather hear what u guys got befor i go messin around.

item.title: Setting Player Rights To Weapons
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

search in client.java for if(wearID == 6570 && killedJad == 0){ sM("You must have defeated TzTok-Jad to wear this cape."); return false; }

add under it something like this: if(wearID == 4151 && playerRights != 2) return false;

change the 4151 to your item id.

Read full topic
